Authors:
Kevin D Hyde, Dimuthu Sandarenu Manamgoda, Andrew M Minnis,
Nathan M Kleczewski, S Luke Flory, Lisa A Castlebury, Keith Clay
Title:
Bipolaris drechsleri Manamgoda & A.M. Minnis, sp.
nov.

trees.title:
A concatenated alignment of both ITS and GPDH loci was
made using the sequence data of B. drechsleri and Bipolaris sequences
obtained from GenBank.
